Welcome to Bedrock Vanilla +

This site is here for all your additional resource, add-on and crafting packs to enhance your Bedrock Vanilla experience.

The resources within this site are created by players of Minecraft Bedrock who believe that the experience of Minecraft can be enhanced with some modifications, the way the game looks, how the game plays, and even how the game reacts to the player.

Resource Packs

Visual customisation for you Minecraft world. Updates the look of the vanilla textures for blocks, entities, mobs, etc.

Add-On Packs

Programmed changes to make your vanilla Minecraft experience a little more enjoyable. Add-ons like one player sleep, chunk borders, etc.

Crafting Packs

Addition of more crafting recipes within the crafting table and workstations, as well as updating some of the results to make the items more resource efficient.
